name: Mount Fuji
info: Mount Fuji is Japan's tallest mountain and one of its most iconic symbols. It is an active stratovolcano that last erupted in 1707-1708. The mountain attracts thousands of climbers and tourists each year who enjoy its beautiful scenery, sunrise views, and the surrounding lakes. Visitors often trek multiple trails; some routes take several hours to reach the summit while others are shorter but steep. The area around Fuji offers cultural sites, hot springs, scenic viewpoints, and hiking opportunities for all skill levels. name: Great Wall of China
info: The Great Wall of China stretches over 13,000 miles and is one of the most impressive architectural feats in human history. name: Eiffel Tower
info: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It has become a global cultural icon of France and one of the most recognizable structures in the world.

name: Grand Canyon
info: The Grand Canyon in Arizona, USA, is a natural wonder carved by the Colorado River. Visitors can hike, raft, or simply enjoy breathtaking panoramic views.

name: Machu Picchu
info: Machu Picchu is an ancient Incan city in the Andes Mountains of Peru. Known for its sophisticated dry-stone walls, terraces, and panoramic views, it's a UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: Santorini
info: Santorini is a Greek island famous for its whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and stunning sunsets over the Aegean Sea. A top destination for romantic getaways.

name: Colosseum
info: The Colosseum in Rome, Italy, is an ancient amphitheater known for gladiator battles and grand architecture. It remains an iconic symbol of Roman history and culture.

name: Taj Mahal
info: The Taj Mahal in Agra, India, is a stunning white marble mausoleum built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan. Known for its beautiful architecture and romantic story, itâ€™s a UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: Niagara Falls
info: Niagara Falls is a group of three waterfalls at the border of the USA and Canada. Visitors enjoy boat tours, scenic viewpoints, and vibrant night illuminations.

name: Sydney Opera House
info: The Sydney Opera House in Australia is an architectural masterpiece and performing arts venue, known for its iconic sail-shaped design and cultural significance.
